law.catch_line: In this title the following words have the meanings indicated....

text.section: In this title the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Department" means the Department of Human Resources.
"Executive Director" means the Executive Director of Family Investment.

"Local department" means:
a local department of social services created or continued in a county under § 3-201 of this article; or
in Montgomery County, the Montgomery County government.
"Local director" means the director of a local department.
"Secretary" means the Secretary of Human Resources.
